//Common headers
#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<utility>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>

using namespace std;


#define ipair std::pair< int, int >
#define ull unsigned long long
#define traverse(container, it) for(typeof(container.begin()) it = container.begin(); it != container.end(); it++)


#define TOLERANCE 1e-5
int main(){
	int testCases= 0;
	cin >> testCases;
	
	for(int tc=1;tc<=testCases;tc++){
		string s1,s2;
		int l1,l2;
		cin >> l1 >> l2;
		cin >> s1;
		cin >> s2;
		
		int dp[l1+1][l2+1];
		
		for(int i=0;i<=l1;i++)			dp[i][0] = i;
		for(int i=0;i<=l2;i++)			dp[0][i] = i;
		int d;
		for(int i=1;i<=l1;i++){
			for(int j=1;j<=l2;j++){
				if(s1[i-1]==s2[j-1])
					dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j-1]+1;
				else
					dp[i][j] = (min(dp[i-1][j], dp[i][j-1])+1);
			
			}
		}
		printf("Case %d: %d\n",tc,dp[l1][l2]);
		
	}
	
	return 0;
}
